alert.note: Alert for Audrain; Boone; Callaway; Moniteau; Monroe; Ralls (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 15 at 9:02PM CST until December 15 at 9:15PM CST by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 915 PM CST FOR NORTHWESTERN RALLS...EASTERN BOONE...CENTRAL AUDRAIN... NORTHWESTERN CALLAWAY...MONROE AND EAST CENTRAL MONITEAU COUNTIES... At 902 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Paris to near Easley, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Columbia, Fulton, Mexico, Centralia, Ashland, Monroe City, Paris, Santa Fe, Columbia Regional Airport, Hallsville, Auxvasse, Perry, Rensselaer, Easley, Murry, Kingdom City, Vandiver, Stoutsville, The Landing and Hatton. This also includes Rock Bridge State Park, Union Covered Bridge Historic Site, Jewell Cemetery Historic Site, and Mark Twain Lake Recreational Area. This includes Interstate 70 in Missouri between exits 126 and 148. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Audrain; Boone; Callaway; Moniteau; Monroe; Ralls
